name: Dwarven Daisy (Lesser)
desc: A dwarven daisy is a string of dozens of firecrackers that create tiny, loud explosions. The string ends with a short, wrapped fuse. Pulling off the wrapping in a quick motion lights the fuse and is done as part of the action to Strike. A dwarven daisy deals the listed fire damage and splash damage. A dwarven daisy also has a chance to dazzle its target. A creature struck by a dwarven daisy must succeed at a Fortitude save or become dazzled for 1 round.
sourceBook: Pathfinder Society Quest #5: The Dragon Who Stole Evoking Day
subTypeDesc: The firework deals 1d6 fire damage and 1 fire splash damage. The DC is 16.
hitEffect: A creature struck by a dwarven daisy must succeed at a Fortitude save with a DC of 16 or become dazzled for 1 round.

name: Dwarven Daisy (Moderate)
desc: A dwarven daisy is a string of dozens of firecrackers that create tiny, loud explosions. The string ends with a short, wrapped fuse. Pulling off the wrapping in a quick motion lights the fuse and is done as part of the action to Strike. A dwarven daisy deals the listed fire damage and splash damage. A dwarven daisy also has a chance to dazzle its target. A creature struck by a dwarven daisy must succeed at a Fortitude save or become dazzled for 1 round.
sourceBook: Pathfinder Society Quest #5: The Dragon Who Stole Evoking Day
subTypeDesc: The firework deals 2d6 fire damage and 2 fire splash damage. The DC is 18.
hitEffect: A creature struck by a dwarven daisy must succeed at a Fortitude save with a DC of 18 or become dazzled for 1 round.
